entry.title: Late Night Love Confessions
entry.summary:
Author: Buddie_Butterflies

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,636Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 108

Summary: Knocking on the Han door at midnight was not his most brilliant move, Eddie realizes as he stands there, and then the door opens, and a very sleepy Maddie is standing before him. ‚ÄúBuck, what's wrong now?‚Äù she asks as she opens the door, her eyes shut, rubbing them. ‚ÄúThis was a mistake,‚Äù Eddie says as he realizes what he has done. Eddie had always gone to Bobby, his captain, for advice, and Bobby was now gone. Chimney was the new captain, so by Eddie‚Äôs logic, he could now turn to him; he had not thought about who Chimney was married to. Maddie stands there, her eyes wide with surprise, when she realizes it isn‚Äôt Buck. ‚ÄúEddie, it‚Äôs not a mistake. Sorry, I thought you were Buck. Please come in.‚Äù Eddie walks in as Chimney comes walking into the living room from the bedroom. ‚ÄúEddie, you ok?‚Äù he asks, concerned. ‚ÄúSorry, used to go to Bobby when he was captain. Sorry I woke you guys, I will let you get back to sleep,‚Äù he goes to turn when Maddie grabs his arm. ‚ÄúEddie, nope, you woke us up, now you're stuck with us. Whatever you say here stays between us, even if it‚Äôs about Buck.‚Äù Maddie tells him, and Eddie can‚Äôt help but feel like he just got clocked.

entry.title: You Belong With Me
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,598Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 18

Summary: Cat Valentine never thought she had a dad. She has been living with her grandma since she can remember. Her mom left when she was really young. Her grandma always said her parents got pregnant during high school. Evan Buckley never knew his high school girlfriend got pregnant. She picked up and moved one day with her mom, her mom got a job in LA so they left Hersery. When Cat is 14, she finds her birth certificate and learns her father is Evan Buckley. She is determined to meet him. Luckily she still lives in LA, and goes to Hollywood Arts. Buck has just returned back to work after the lawsuit and is on the outs with his family. [You do not need to watch Victorious] You may have noticed I'm having an obsession with extremely RANDOM crossovers ü§∑ü´£ü§£

entry.title: The Archive Of Almosts
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,827Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 7

Summary: The warmth of it seeps through him until he can‚Äôt tell where panic ends and relief begins. Eddie should push him back, should wake himself, should do anything but lean into it‚Äîyet his head tips, his lips part, and for a fractured moment he kisses Buck back. It lands with the inevitability of routine. Like something they‚Äôve done a thousand times‚Äîwhich they have, he guesses, with whatever version of Eddie usually belongs here. And then he wakes up, gasping, the fan clicking overhead in the otherwise silent room‚Äîa sobering reminder that he‚Äôs really alone. Or,While in El Paso, Eddie begins dreaming of an alternate life where him and Buck are together. The years of their dream life together start bleeding into reality, until Eddie can‚Äôt tell if he‚Äôs losing his mind or finally seeing the truth. Or,A loose spin on The Fates from Greek mythology, doing their thing to get these idiots together, because why not

entry.title: Happier Than Ever
entry.summary:
Author: stonyismyotp

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,486Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 225

Summary: "It‚Äôs Dr. Wells. The Dr. Wells Bobby had sent Buck to, over a year and a half ago. The same one he couldn‚Äôt quite admit had taken advantage of him, had made him feel numb whenever he tried sharing his feelings, who made it impossible to open up to any other therapist‚Äî She was there and she had a baby. A baby who couldn‚Äôt be more than ten months old. A baby with his blonde hair and bright blue eyes, not her dark hair and dark eyes." or Dr. Wells had a baby & never told Buck. - title from the song by billie eilish pls heed the tags, & i'll be putting warnings at the beginning of each chapter, this is going to be a relatively heavy fic (tho it will be focused on recovery) so pls prioritize your own mental health.

He glared at that stupid cat who got to cuddle up next to Buck when he couldn‚Äôt. Not that he wanted to. No way, he just didn‚Äôt want his best friend to get bit by that damn cat obviously. entry.title: The Stains Remain
entry.summary:
Author: alikatastic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,734Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Buck tells himself he can live two lives: the man who makes breakfast for Eddie and Chris, and the man who hunts monsters in the dark. Slipping out of the Diaz house at night feels like betrayal, but the thought of a predator living so close is worse. The hunt is supposed to be clean, controlled, proof that he is still in charge of his own darkness. Instead, the night spirals into blood and chaos, leaving Buck shaken in ways he cannot admit. By morning, bleach clings to his skin, and Eddie is waiting with questions Buck is not sure he can answer.
